item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Installation indicLP is an easy to install library, making itself available through pip for all python users, while also providing github repository for direct cloning. Installation through pip package pip install indicLP Prerequisite Libraries indicLP requires the following libraries for comfortable execution: torchtext snowballstemmer indic_transliteration gensim pickle tarfile
